name: Apex Ruler, Bastion
effect: [CONT](VC):During your turn, all of your grade 3 units get [Power] +2000. [AUTO](VC)[1/turn]:At the end of the battle that your drive check revealed a grade 3, [COST][discard a card from your hand], choose one of your rear-guards, [Stand] it, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: Fulfilling one's mission is the pride of knights. Raise it high above the heavens.

name: Knight of Heavenly Spear, Rooks
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by "Apex Ruler, Bastion", [COST][reveal three grade 3 cards from your hand], and draw a card. [CONT](RC):During your turn, if you have three or more grade 3 units, this unit gets "Boost", and [Power] +5000.
flavor: Leave the rest to us. We'll definitely protect you.

name: Knight of Heavenly Sword, Fort
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by "Knight of Heavenly Spear, Rooks", [COST][reveal two grade 3 cards from your hand], reveal the top card of your deck, call it to (RC) if it is a unit card, and put it into your drop if it isn't. [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your grade 3 vanguards, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: "Cloud Knights" protect the law and order of the land from the skies.

name: Knight of Heavenly Bow, Base
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: The celestials believe themselves to be the chosen ones.

name: Vehement Witch, Ramana
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle.

name: Knight of Broadaxe, Rafluke
effect: [ACT](RC):[COST][Put this unit into your soul], choose one of your grade 3 rear-guards, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: Even if it is covered in mud, a will of gold will never dull.

name: Shadow Bow Archer, Lisana
flavor: Light will always be accompanied by shadows. That is the unwavering truth.

name: Platinum Wolf
effect: [ACT](RC):[COST][Soul-Blast 2], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: The platinum wolf nestles among the residents of the land.

name: Lifesaving Angel, Kurabiel
effect: [CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck.)[AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), [COST][discard a card from your hand], choose one of your units, and it cannot be hit until end of that battle.
flavor: If its just this, I'll be able to do something about it myself!

name: Spiritual King of Determination, Olbaria
effect: (You may only have one [Over] trigger in a deck. When revealed as a trigger, remove that card, draw a card, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] Trigger +100 Million until end of turn! If revealed during drive check, activate its additional effect!)Additional Effect - Choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] Trigger +100 Million until end of turn!
flavor: A noble determination will remove all obstacles.

name: Knight of Heavenly Hammer, Gurgant
effect: (When revealed as a trigger, choose one of your units, and it gets [Critical] Trigger +1 until end of turn! Then, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] Trigger +10000 until end of turn!)
flavor: The sin for distrupting order is heavy. No need for excessive considerations.

name: Knight of Heavenly Pierce, Gallus
effect: (When revealed as a trigger, draw a card! Then, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] Trigger +10000 until end of turn!)
flavor: The divide between the heavens and the earth is deeper than one can imagine.

name: Knight of Heavenly Rend, Lif
effect: (When revealed as a trigger, all of your front row units get [Power] Trigger +10000 until end of turn!)
flavor: By experiencing an era without prayers, the world is born anew.

name: Healer of Heavenly Staff, Arshes
effect: (You may only have up to four [Heal] triggers in a deck. When revealed as a trigger, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] Trigger +10000 until end of turn! Then, if the number of cards in your damage zone is equal to or more than your opponent's, choose a card from your damage zone, and heal it!)
flavor: Your shedding of blood is what is wrong.

name: The Hour of Holy Judgement Cometh
effect: Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 2]!Draw two cards, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn!
flavor: Feel the full weight of my faith!
